question: guardians of the galaxy blue guy in prison
api_result: In "Guardians of the Galaxy," the blue character in prison is known as Yondu Udonta. He is portrayed by actor Michael Rooker. Yondu is the leader of the Ravagers and has a complex relationship with Peter Quill (Star-Lord), whom he abducted as a child. In the film, he is depicted as a morally ambiguous character with a mix of villainous and heroic traits. His character plays a significant role throughout the "Guardians of the Galaxy" series, particularly in "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2."
